SourceProxy.name: PointCloudLinearProjector
SourceProxy.label: PointCloud Linear Projector

Documentation.short_help: Create a linear projection image of the current frame
Documentation.long_help: Create a linear projection image of the current frame

SourceProxy.Documentation: Create a linear projection image of the current frame

IntVectorProperty.name: Resolution
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The image resolution. The actual pixel size will vary as a function of the projected bounding box.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Plane Normal
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The normal of the plane onto which we want to project

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Rank Percentile
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The percentile of the value to keep for each pixel. 0.5 indicates the median value.

StringVectorProperty.name: SelectValueArray
StringVectorProperty.label: Value
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The value to use in the image. If "height map" is selected then this will be ignored.

IntVectorProperty.name: Height Map
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked, the value of each pixel will be the distance to the plane of projection instead of the selected input value.

IntVectorProperty.name: Shift To Zero
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked, shift all values so that the minimum value becomes zero.

IntVectorProperty.name: Export As Char
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked, scale all image values to unsigned chars in the range [0,255].

IntVectorProperty.name: Should Apply Median Filter
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked, apply a median filter to the image.

IntVectorProperty.name: Median Filter Width
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Size of the neighborhood when performing median filter
